text: If you can do it better than me, then you do it.
author: Kanye West

text: In Paris, you're as far as possible from the land of pleasant smiles.
author: Kanye West

text: I live and breathe every element in life.
author: Kanye West

text: To be a visionary, all you have to do is make decisions based off of your eyes instead of your ears and your memory.
author: Kanye West

text: The plan was to drink until the pain is over, But what's worse, the pain or the hangover?
author: Kanye West

text: If you admire somebody, you should go ahead and tell them. People never get the flowers while they can still smell them.
author: Kanye West

text: The dinosaurs are remembered only by their bones.
author: Kanye West

text: The only luxury is time. The time you get to spend with your family.
author: Kanye West

text: Being fresh is more important than having money.
author: Kanye West

text: Society and public opinion can beat the wings off of angels.
author: Kanye West

text: I liberate minds with my music. That's more important than liberating a few people from apartheid or whatever.
author: Kanye West

text: Even went out his way so you could check in an extra bag now you wanna divide the yam like it equate the math.
author: Kanye West

text: And we be strapping up like the navy seal do Sweet as banana split every time I peel through.
author: Kanye West

text: I won’t go into a big spiel about reincarnation, but the first time I was in the Gucci store in Chicago was the closest I’ve ever felt to home.
author: Kanye West

text: I'm not heartless. I've just learned how to use my heart less.
author: Kanye West

text: How could you be so cold as a winter wind when it breezes yo'.
author: Kanye West

text: If I was more complacent and I let things slide, my life would be easier, but you all wouldn't be as entertained. My misery is your pleasure.
author: Kanye West

text: Everyone should be their own biggest fan,
author: Kanye West
